title: Satpura National Park Eco-Luxe Lodge Escape with All-Inclusive Dining
description: Surrender to the jungle charms of Satpura National Park with a stay at Forsyth Lodge, fringed by the buffer zone of the famed Satpura Tiger Reserve. An eco-luxe paradise with just 12 cottages scattered across 44 acres of dense jungle, Forsyth Lodge will take you one step closer to Satpura's charming wilderness. Get away from the city noise and lose yourself in the lap of nature with an all-inclusive stay.
offer_address: Satpura National Park, No.14/1, Village Bija Kheri, Sohagpur, Dist Hoshangabad, Sohagpur, Madhya Pradesh 461771

title: All-Inclusive Jungle Experience on the Edge of Satpura Tiger Reserve
description: Venture to the heart of the jungle with Escapes Club and discover the striking Satpura Tiger Reserve, a sprawling natural park covering over 1400sqkm. Stay at the eco-friendly Forsyth Lodge, ranked #1 lodge in Satpura Tiger Reserve on TripAdvisor and located right on the outskirts of the park. Nature will be your companion on this adventurous stay which includes daily breakfast, lunch and dinner and a drive around the buffer zone of the park.
location_description: Forsyth Lodge - Satpura Tiger Reserve OLD
offer_address: Satpura National Park, No.14/1, Village Bija Kheri, Sohagpur, Dist Hoshangabad, Sohagpur, Madhya Pradesh 461771, India

title: Exotic Wildlife Retreat near Satpura National Park with All-Inclusive Meals
description:
Find yourself by the mesmerising backwaters of the Denwa River in Satpura National Park when you book a stay at the gorgeous Denwa Backwater Escape. Crafted exclusively for wildlife enthusiasts and nature-lovers, this exotic lodge will compel you to forget the world and its worries with its magnificent cottages, splendid views of the backwaters and Pachmarhi Hills, and easy access to Satpura's wild inhabitants. 

This lush, 10-acre jungle paradise is currently one of the hottest properties in the region thanks to its eco-friendly architecture, mouth-watering cuisine and thrilling wildlife experiences like boat safaris, nature walks, kayaking and camping. Less than four hours from Bhopal Airport and easily accessible from the major cities of Mumbai, Delhi and Ahmedabad, Denwa Backwater Escape can easily become the destination for your next dreamy weekend holiday.
offer_address: Satpura National Park, Madhai Village Sarangpur, Khapa, Madhya Pradesh 461771
